name: Big Sky Farm
description:
Developer: Josh Burleson (Code, Art, Music)

 Controls:
Movement: "A" to move left, "D" to move right.
Interact: "Space".
Inventory: "I".
Inspect Plot: Hold "S".
Use Item: "Space" when plot selected.

Goal:
Buy seeds, cultivate your garden using tools, harvest and sell crops
until you have enough $ to buy a Great Pumpkin seed. On harvesting a Great Pumpkin you win the game.)

 Notes:

  • Before I put in music I had bit SFX in the game. It ended up clashing with the music so I had to remove them without having the time to replace them with new ones. When you "use" an item from your inventory you can hear a leftover SFX I missed.
  • Game pacing is off. I only started working on the game a week before the deadline so I didn't have time to properly implement a tutorial. It may be hard to understand what you need to do when you start. This was an oversight on my part.
  • Music was done by myself playing guitar in a damp basement. The submission deadline was 3 hours away and I only had time for a single take. Hence poor sound quality, off notes and background noise. It's a hot mess.
  • Game takes about 20 minutes to complete. I feel this is far too long for a game jam game but oh well. If you stick with it till the end you are rewarded with a nice cut scene.

Thanks for playing!
I really appreciate anyone who takes the time to play the game. Feel free to leave comments/feedback and let me know what you think.
